name: Zombie Kill Chamber 3D (A Sniper Gun Shooting Dark Horror Survival Game)
name_original: Zombie Kill Chamber 3D (A Sniper Gun Shooting Dark Horror Survival Game)
description:
It's the era of dark souls! The ultimate zombie survival challenge that will make you feel the epic war! Hurry up Shooter! Take your machine gun and clear the space of those dead zombies! Cool 3D environment, horror sounds, horrific undead beasts in the best survival experience. Its time to bring the war to those walking undead souls and save the human race! Download now and share with your friends and family.

Happy killing :)
